sentences: Steven M. Berlin (born September 14, 1955, Philadelphia) is an American saxophonist, keyboardist and record producer, best known as a member of the rock group Los Lobos and, before that, Top Jimmy & the Rhythm Pigs, the Blasters, and the Flesh Eaters.
Berlin is married and lives with his wife and children in Portland, Oregon.
Berlin joined the band Tuatara as a side project in 1998 on their second album, Trading with the Enemy.
